data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Acevedo-Rodriguez, Pedro, Somner, Genise Vieira (2018): New species of Paullinia (Sapindaceae) from continental tropical America. PhytoKeys 114: 95-113, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.114.29351, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.114.29351
